post.author: 부기흡
post.content:
I checked in the initial version of database scripts in the repository.

Attached is a MySQL version but has not been tested (simply because I do not have MySQL installed yet). Also this does not include the instructor table discussed at the previous meeting yet.

Review and give me feedback. If you have a chance to actually test it, let me know the results, and feel free to go ahead and fix the errors if you like.
post.title: database intall/uninstall scripts for mysql
